text: Se balale -- ''tomara tara prati bisbasa sthapana karale ami tomadera anumati debara age'i? Se-i niscaya tomadera guru ye tomadera jadubidya sikhiyeche. Sutaram sighra'i tomara tera pabe. Ami niscaya tomadera hata o tomadera pa ara'ari- bhabe kete phelaba'i, ara tomadera saba'ike sule caraba.â€™â€™
